modName: Crazy Sexy Cicero - Plus Jester Clothes Retexture
summary: A Cicero face morph. A matching Imperial male preset. Darker, more sinister jester clothes textures.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Crazy Sexy Cicero
Version: 1
Date: 1/4/2013
Category: Companions
Author: faeriexdecay
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29446

Description
===========
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/29446-1-1357356266.png[/img][/center]
First and foremost, this mod exists as ONLY a simple face morph for Cicero that aims to improve the way he looks. "Crazy Sexy Cicero" is not meant to imply that he has been transformed into some insanely and impossibly attractive Greek god - no, I've kept his vanilla appearance and only tweaked a few minor things to improve his look. I've greatly reduced his sharp cheeks and brow, widened his jaw ever so slightly, and made his lips a little less duck-ish, among other tiny things. None of his features have been changed, only adjusted. "Crazy Sexy Cicero" is a name I came up with for fun. :) Please note that this does not make any other changes to Cicero - only his face. He's a bit of an anomaly and not really easily customizable beyond what I've done simply because he's not part of the normal follower system. Not only that, but there are actually three versions of him that exist in the CK that appear depending on what stage of the Dark Brotherhood quest you're on. I've made sure to change the face of all three versions. Please let me know if you experience anything strange with this plugin - it's my first attempt at this kind of mod with the CK.

For a quick, easy comparison without having to dig through the screenshots, click:
[url=http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/29446-1-1357355966.jpg]BEFORE[/url] versus [url=http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/29446-2-1357355966.jpg]AFTER[/url]

I have also recolored the jester clothes for Cicero as well as for everyone else, male and female. They're much darker, grittier, and hopefully a little more sinister. They are based off of the official HD texture pack; the normals included are the ones from the texture pack, and the diffuse textures come in three versions - small, medium, and big.

BIG - All textures are uncompressed and quite big. Best quality.
MEDIUM - Glove, boot, and hat textures are compressed. Male and female outfits are uncompressed. Balance between quality and performance.
SMALL - All textures are compressed. Best performance - same sizes as HD texture pack, I think.

Also available is an Imperial male preset I tossed together during the making process of this Cicero face morph. I wasn't sure if anyone would care for it but decided to include it anyway.

The All-In-One Pack includes all three things - the Cicero face morph, the jester clothes textures (medium version), and the Imperial male preset.

Cicero's Look
=============
If you want Cicero to appear as he does in my screenshots, please download these amazing mods! Don't forget to endorse them, too! :D
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by Urshi[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21451]HQ Eyebrows - vanilla texture replacers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4307]AOF Believable Hair[/url]

NMM Install/Uninstall
=====================
Simply download the options you want with NMM and install/uninstall regularly - simple and easy!

Manual Install
==============
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to (install folder)\Skryim\Data\
3. Make sure to activate the plugins via the Skyrim Launcher.

Manual Uninstall
================
For the face morph, remove the following:
meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\Skyrim.esm\0001BDB1.NIF
meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\Skyrim.esm\0009BCAF.NIF
meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\Skyrim.esm\000550F0.NIF
textures\actors\character\facegendata\facetint\skyrim.esm\0001BDB1.dds
textures\actors\character\facegendata\facetint\skyrim.esm\0009BCAF.dds
textures\actors\character\facegendata\facetint\skyrim.esm\000550F0.dds
Crazy Sexy Cicero.esp

For the preset, remove "Crazy Sexy Cicero Imperial Male Preset.esp" from Data folder.

For jester textures, remove everything in this folder:
textures\clothes\jester\

Credits
=======
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20741]PINEAPPLEVISION - DARK Renaissance[/url] - amazing ENB seen in my images
BIG thanks to the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4184206]fantastic user named urshi[/url] for his friendship, advice, and insanely helpful tutorials. <3
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and the official HD texture pack.
Thanks to the Nexus for its awesomeness.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Licensing/Legal
===============
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod. If I don't respond, that means I did not and never will give you permission - assume my answer is no and move on.
